sentences: Alif Abdullah (born September 21, 1989), better known as Alyph or Alif is a Singaporean-Malay singer, performer, songwriter, composer and producer based in Malaysia.
Between 2005 and 2015, Alif was active as part of the Singaporean hip hop and R&B duo, SleeQ, along with his cousin, Syarifullah/Syarif.
He signed with Def Jam Recordings South East Asia in 2019.
